title: No xp after game
body: So I was playing a game as amumu had a great start then I get a BSOD(Blue screen of death) my computer is quite slow so it took a while but I came back  and helped my team secure the victory. i ended the game 6/3/11 not much dmg but I was amumu landing pretty good ults and at the end of the game I got no XP.

replies.body: So I just played an aram game and got no xp I did not d/c I played the whole match.

Hey there, even if your team wins anyone marked as a leaver would still get a loss.  It sounds like you were gone for long enough to get marked for leaving.  This blue screen doesn't feel good and could be suggesting some hardware problem.  Double check your air vents for overheating, and take a break from matchmaking for now.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead so our tech team can check this out with you directly, and stick to customs for now.

ok I understand but this systems is going to encourage people to not even play the rest of the match after a dc if no xp is given, like why even bother coming back to play if you still get punished. Just my 2 cents and thank you for the clarification and your time to respond.
To clarify, you won't be marked as a leaver as soon as a disconnection occurs.  It's not instant!  You have to be gone for a long enough period of time before being marked.
